name: Zeus Finance
description: Zeus Finance is a decentralized financial suite built on the Avalanche Network. Our focus is on providing DeFi-as-a-Service (DaaS) to our community and then expanding into a platform that provides a safe and prosperous place to store capital. Zeus Finance offers its users the ability to launch a personalized blockchain node in a "lightning" fast fashion. It efficiently aggregates returns from protocol-owned liquidity with returns from DeFi protocols across many chains to allocate rewards. Zeus Finance aims to help holders generate constant passive income with minimum effort. We do the heavy lifting by researching and identifying promising yield-generating options while you sit back and collect rewards.
